Great Conqueror

This character is a feared and ruthless leader that conquers far and wide. As a feared ruler, no one dares to do anything against him or harm him as this character is as strong as a lion. As feared as he is, even Death is affraid of this character as it seems that he is very healthy, as if he is blessed with divinity.
